thread.title: Daniel Dubats
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Daniel Dubats

author: Daniel Dubats
title: Daniel Dubats
text: Very good experience with the staff. They were very kind, knowledgeable, and aimed to please. The delivery was right on time and they did a fantastic job. Thank you for the wonderful experience and we will be a returning customer.
